description:
Kakuta-sensei, the guidance counselor, keeps an eye out for Sakamoto at the school gate every morning. But every day, Sakamoto arrives at the last possible minute and uses all kinds of tricks to slip through the gate in time, much to Kakuta-sensei`s chagrin. Now he`s determined to find Sakamoto`s weak point and scold him until he can`t even stand up straight...
Source: crunchyroll
